snippet: Francis invoked the harsh treatment endured by indigenous people and called for social justice.
abstract: Pope Francis travels to Mexican state of Chiapas, region with long history of armed rebellion, as part of six-day tour through country; during outdoor Mass attended by tens of thousands, Francis denounces discrimination and exploitation of region's impoverished indigenous people and calls for social justice.

byline.original: By JIM YARDLEY and PAULINA VILLEGAS
byline.contributor: Azam Ahmed and Elisabeth Malkin contributed reporting from Mexico City.

lead_paragraph: Francis invoked the harsh treatment endured by indigenous people and called for social justice.

headline.main: At Mass, Pope Francis Embraces ‘Misunderstood’ of Mexico
headline.print_headline: At Mass, Pope Embraces ‘Misunderstood’ of Mexico

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Escuela Normal Rural Raul Isidro Burgos (Guerrero, Mexico)
